title: Try 'Task Batching' for a More Productive Week
description:
While most productivity methods focus on chunks of time throughout a single day, there are few that address what you can get done in a string of many days. So much planning can be daunting, but there’s one method that can help you structure longer stretches of time for the better. It’s called “task batching.”

Read more...

description:

description:

title: Make a Cute Little Batch of Mini Tortilla Chips in Your Air Fryer
description:

title: You Can Get a Lifetime 1TB Cloud Storage Account for 85% Off Right Now
description:

title: Google Chrome's Password Manager Is Getting Better
description:

description:

title: You Can Lock Your iPhone From Your Apple Watch If Someone Snatches Your Phone
description:

You can make a few changes to protect your iOS data from thieves, but most of those tricks won’t work if your phone is already unlocked. But if you own an Apple Watch, you can…

description:

title: Why Your Favorite Subreddits Are Going Dark on June 12
description:
If you’re in the habit of visiting r/aww for cute pet videos, or r/todayilearned to have your mind blown, the upcoming Reddit blackout might put a wrench in your plans. On June 12-14, thousands of subreddits have committed to going dark to protest a Reddit company decision.

title: When You Ask AI to Write an Obituary
description:
